description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the DCOM remote cross-session activation elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38061), it is essential to apply the relevant security updates provided by Microsoft.

1. Download and install the KB5040442 update for Windows 11 Version 23H2 and Version 22H2.

2. For Windows 11 Version 21H2, install KB5040431.

3. For Windows 10, apply KB5040448 or KB5040427 based on your specific build version.

**Details**:
- These updates address improper access control vulnerabilities and prevent potential elevation of privilege attacks within the DCOM service.
- For manual installation, download the respective update packages from the Microsoft Update Catalog. 
- Ensure that your system is running the correct build version to match the updates applied.

Relevant KB Articles: 
- KB5040442: [Install Here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)  
- KB5040431: [Install Here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)  
- KB5040448: [Install Here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)  
- KB5040427: [Install Here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)  

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure administrative privileges are available to install updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
